name: Amy YOUNG and John Scott, as Co-Personal Representatives of the Estate of Andrew Lee Scott, Deceased, et al., petitioners, v. Gary S. BORDERS, Sheriff, Lake County, Florida, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Amy YOUNG and John Scott, as Co-Personal Representatives of the Estate of Andrew Lee Scott, Deceased, et al., petitioners,
v.
Gary S. BORDERS, Sheriff, Lake County, Florida, et al.
attorneys: Motion of Rutherford Institute for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Second Amendment Foundation, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Amy YOUNG and John Scott, as Co-Personal Representatives of the Estate of Andrew Lee Scott, Deceased, et al., petitioners,
v.
Gary S. BORDERS, Sheriff, Lake County, Florida, et al.
No. 17-249.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 8, 2018.
Motion of Rutherford Institute for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Second Amendment Foundation, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
